item.title: Building defense in depth: Simplifying identity security with new partner integrations
item.description: We’re thrilled to announce the General Availability of powerful new partner integrations in Microsoft Entra that take identity security to the next level. Building on our enterprise-grade security foundation, these seamless in-product Entra integrated solutions now deliver cutting-edge defenses across every layer of your identity perimeter. From edge-level DDoS protection and intelligent bot mitigation to government ID-based account recovery, organizations can effortlessly enable world-class security solutions—all within the Microsoft Entra portal.
